title: Font ID - Numbers
content:
So

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203632im_/http:/typophile.com/files/what_font_5426.jpg)

Sorry about the bad quality - it’s the best I have.  
Can you ID the typeface of these numbers?  
Thanks!

 [‹ an interesting font, please help me...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203632/http:/typophile.com/node/50686 "Go to previous forum topic") [Three Cups of Tea ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203632/http:/typophile.com/node/50669 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pangawanga

comments.content:
Thanks Stephen, I’ll try to get that typeface.  
Should anyone have other close (similar) alternatives, please tell me, just in case I can’t get my hands on Monoline :D
